pageContext.patina: green. except near edge & butt, where it is copper colour
pageContext.other: 3 cross section drawings of palstave on reverse.,Shield hollow? below stop.,Flanges widen slightly above stop to widest point, then taper to just below butt.,Butt rounded.,Thick midrib below shield, wider at shield then narrows towards edge, runs about 2/3's of the way to edge.,Blade widens quickly at edge bevel, edge somewhat crescent shaped, tips somewhat flared but worn.
pageContext.publications: Calkin 1954, 58 fig 1.3, 59 - presumably,Rowlands 1976, no. 538 Rowlands 1976, no. 555 } do they both refer to this palstave? no. 555 almost certainly does
pageContext.collection: Bournemouth Museum,1927,Private Collection,Col. E.B. Anderson.,Woodmanton.,35 Wellington Road.,Bournemouth,Bournemouth Nat. Science Soc.
pageContext.site: England, hampshire.,bournemouth.,talbot woods,found in digging foundations of a villa, in talbot woods; between the easterly & middle railway bridge. on the north side of rly. - south of b.l blkm,1926
